alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 07 at 7:26PM MST until March 07 at 8:30PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: CCA The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southeastern Judith Basin County in central Montana... South central Fergus County in central Montana... * Until 830 PM MST. * At 727 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Moore to near Hobson, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 61 and 89. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 2, and between mile markers 1 and 2. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Moore, Glengarry, Buffalo and Garneill. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Wet roadways will quickly freeze. Black ice will cause roads, bridges and overpasses to become slick and dangerous. Slow down and be prepared for sudden loss of traction.
